name: Kitty cat: games for boy & girls under 6 year free
name_original: Kitty cat: games for boy & girls under 6 year free
description:
Kitty Cat Games For Kids Free - Is your little girl or boy a big lover of cats, tigers and lions? If so, he or she is sure to love all of the games found in the Cat Sounds: Games For Kids. This exciting activity app is filled with engaging cat meow sounds your little child can explore in the room...but the Kitty Games For Kids Free doesn't end there.

The activity app also comes with kittens matching game , and many beautiful, real kitten puzzle games.
Designed for 2 years and up. Gameplay is very simple and suited for younger children - when the sound of a little cat or kitty is played your kid needs to touch on a friendly picture.

Main features:
- Real, high quality sounds of kitties and lions
- 4 fun memory games of cat pictures
- 10 Real, high quality puzzles for 3 difficulty level with baby cat, fat cat, big cats
- Free, Ads support development of future updates and new games for kids.

Another amazingly cool feature to the Kitty Cat Games For Kids Free makes it even more awesome then just matching- your little kid must find the icons that link for their match choices! And when they do make a linked match the little driving game shows them the link. This important element, and the matching itself, provides a real educational bonus and playing Cat Games For Kids: Sounds also promotes:
-Fine motor skills.
-Memory and recognition skills.
-Hand eye coordination.
-Early math concepts.


This application is under active development, we always welcome your suggestion to improve "cat sounds and puzzles" application.
Please send us email on appkeszito101 [-at-] gmail.com

Don't wait! Download now and enjoy!
